text: I ve been thinking about suicide lately but not in the way you thinkMy whole life I ve struggles with depression and suicidal thoughts  It started young  and lately  no I haven t been wanting to die  I ve been thinking about my past suicidal thoughts and behavior  The way I felt  and what I wanted to do because I was feeling whatever type of way  And it makes me very sad  And I think what I m most afraid of now is repeating the same cycles  feeling that type of pain again  and not coming back from it  doing it   I ve been realizing that my mental health causes me to ignore  try to forget  certain things  It can be a song  a tv show  a book  If I know it ll make me  feel  anything I tend to try to ignore it  Probably why I can t finish a movie or a book or a show  sometimes a song or album  And I just  go on social media and aimlessly scroll  Which doesn t really trigger much emotion in me  I just do it to do it   I always tend to imagine myself in other people s situations and feel the way they feel  I think that s what an Empath is  I tend to hurt my own feelings with unreal scenarios in my head  And I tend to be a little too deep into philosophy and deep thought that really makes me question everything It s easy for me to find something to be sad about  but I don t think I can help it   And no one gets it really   That s it for now
summary: I have struggled with depression and suicidal thoughts since I was young. Recently I have been thinking about my past suicidal thoughts and behavior. I am afraid of repeating the same cycles and not coming back from it. My mental health causes me to ignore try to forget certain things.
cleaned: struggle depression suicidal thought young recently think past suicidal thought behavior afraid repeat cycle not come mental health cause ignore try forget certain thing
